content.text: I recently got a cat.
Congrats! What kind of cat?
A tuxedo cat! His name is Shadow.
Aww, I love tuxedo cats! They're so cute.
He is! He's also super playful.
I used to have a cat named Mittens. She was a tabby.
I love tabbies! They're so pretty.
Yeah, they are. Mittens was the best. She was always there for me.
I'm glad you had such a good experience with cats. I'm sure Shadow will be the same for me.
I'm sure he will! Cats are the best.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
Same here! I love rock and roll.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love them too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, go deep sea diving, and make jewelry.

That's awesome! I love playing basketball too. I've never been deep sea diving, but it sounds really cool. And I love jewelry! I write children's books, so I like to make jewelry to give to my characters.
That's so cool! I love children's books. I've always wanted to write one.
You should! It's a lot of fun. And it's really rewarding to see your book in print.
I might just do that! Thanks for the encouragement!
